snippet: The N.H.L. and players’ union finalized the new collective bargaining agreement, allowing training camps to open Sunday followed by a 48-game season.
abstract: NHL and players’ union finalize new collective bargaining agreement, allowing training camps to open followed by a 48-game season.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and players’ union finalized the new collective bargaining agreement, allowing training camps to open Sunday followed by a 48-game season.

headline.seo: N.H.L. and Players’ Union Finalize Agreement
headline.main: Sides Sign Agreement; Training Camps to Open
headline.print_headline: Sides Sign Agreement; Training Camps to Open
